item.title: Crainial shift is not about cranium
item.description: Info Updates on 20250408: Fixed a bug in parsing memory operand. Improved error message displaying. So in BJJ there is a term “cranial shift”, which is just a fancy way to say “shift to control your opponent’s head movement” Ironically the cranial shift is never about the cranium
